name: Movie Quiz: The Parent Trap: 15 Questions |   Movies

questions.explanation:
Lindsay Lohan.

	I think they did a good job picking this actress.

questions.text: Which actress was in both movies?
questions.explanation:
Joanna Barnes.

	Joanna Barnes came back in the role of Vicki.  Vicki was Meredith's mother in the remake.

questions.text: Elizabeth was Sharon and Susan's mother.
questions.explanation:
False.

	She was Hallie and Annie's mother in the remake.

Boston.

	Annie was from London and Susan was from Carmel.

questions.text: Susan and Hallie are both from California.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Susan was from the Monteray/Carmel area and Hallie was from Napa.

questions.text: Hallie and Nick live next door to and own a ______?
questions.explanation:
vineyard.

	Nick had always dreamed of owning his own vineyard.

questions.text: When Vicky and Sharon were discussing the engagement, Vicky said to Sharon "Don't play with the _______, you'll be in way over your head".
questions.explanation:
big girls.

	That happened after Vicky told Sharon she was going to marry her father so she had better get used to the idea.  Sharon replied, "wanna bet?"

Brian Keith and Dennis Quaid.

	Robert Reed played Mike Brady on "The Brady Bunch".

questions.text: Hallie and Annie poured honey on Vicki's toes while she was sleeping during the campout.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Gotcha!  It was Sharon and Susan.

questions.text: What did Hallie and Annie give Meredith to use as mosquito repellant?
questions.explanation:
sugar and water.

	When Nick checked to see what she was using, he said "You're going to attract every mosquito in the state with this stuff, it's sugar and water".

questions.text: Did Sharon and Susan do the same thing to Vicki that Hallie and Annie did to Meredith in the previous question?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Mitch said pretty much the same thing Nick did.

questions.text: According to both movies how do you scare away a mountain lion?
questions.explanation:
hitting two sticks together.

	You can tell Vicki and Meredith are both city girls.

questions.text: In both movies who was the first to discover the girls had switched places?
questions.explanation:
Verbena/Chessy.

	In the first movie Sharon told Verbena who she was after Verbena said, "If I didnt know better I would say your were_____."  In the second movie Annie told Chessy who she was when Chessy said pretty much the same thing that Verbena did.  I apologize for any confusion when I had grandfather as the correct awnser.

Pops.

	As Hallie and Elizabeth are getting ready to leave London, Hallie says "Bye, Pops" when she is talking to Grandfather.

questions.text: What did Elizabeth throw at Nick on the day she left?
questions.explanation:
hair dryer.

	When they were on the boat the girls had rented, Elizabeth and Nick were talking about the day she left.  She asked "Did I hurt you when I threw that what was it at you?"  Nick answered, "It was a hair dryer."
